itunes:title: Episode 309 - What REALLY Happened On The Set Of Lethal Weapon
title: Episode 309 - What REALLY Happened On The Set Of Lethal Weapon
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson sits down with actor Clayne Crawford who played "Riggs" on Fox's hit tv show Lethal Weapon to discuss his recent firing from the show.  In this exclusive interview he finally reveals his side of the story after months of silence.
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson sits down with actor Clayne Crawford who played "Riggs" on Fox's hit tv show Lethal Weapon to discuss his recent firing from the show.  In this exclusive interview he finally reveals his side of the story after months of silence.
